item.title: KPConv - Flexible and Deformable Convolution for Point Clouds 리뷰
item.description: 원문 : Thomas, Hugues, et al. “Kpconv: Flexible and deformable convolution for point clouds.” Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF International Conference on Computer Vision. 2019.

item.title: Large-scale Point Cloud Semantic Segmentation with Superpoint Graphs 리뷰
item.description: 원문 : Landrieu, Loic, and Martin Simonovsky. “Large-scale point cloud semantic segmentation with superpoint graphs.” Proceedings of the IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition. 2018.

item.title: Graph Attention Convolution for Point Cloud Semantic Segmentation 리뷰
item.description: 원문 : Wang, Lei, et al. “Graph attention convolution for point cloud semantic segmentation.” Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition. 2019.

item.title: PointNet++ - Deep Hierarchical Feature Learning on Point Sets in a Metric Space 리뷰
item.description: 원문 : Qi, Charles Ruizhongtai, et al. “Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space.” Advances in neural information processing systems. 2017.

item.title: Dynamic Edge-Conditioned Filters in Convolutional Neural Networks on Graphs 리뷰
item.description: 원문 : Simonovsky, Martin, and Nikos Komodakis. “Dynamic edge-conditioned filters in convolutional neural networks on graphs.” Proceedings of the IEEE conference on computer vision and pattern recognition. 2017.

item.title: BERT - Pretraining of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding 리뷰
item.description: 원문 : Devlin, Jacob, et al. “Bert: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding.” arXiv preprint arXiv:1810.04805 (2018).

item.title: EfficientDet - Scalable and Efficient Object Detection
item.description: 원문 : Tan, Mingxing, Ruoming Pang, and Quoc V. Le. “Efficientdet: Scalable and efficient object detection.” Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition. 2020.

item.title: End-to-End Object Detection with Transformers (DETR)
item.description: 원문 : Carion, Nicolas, et al. “End-to-End Object Detection with Transformers.” arXiv preprint arXiv:2005.12872 (2020).

item.title: Attention is All You Need
item.description: 원문 : Vaswani, Ashish, et al. “Attention is all you need.” Advances in neural information processing systems. 2017.
